title: Quick Transmigration: Heroine Arrives, Woman Rapidly Retreats! - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Ancient Times   Appearance Changes   Autism   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   College/University   Cultivation   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Familial Love   Female Protagonist   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Incest   Interdimensional Travel   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Yandere   Modern Day   Multiple Realms   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Politics   Possessive Characters   Post-apocalyptic   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Showbiz   Sibling Rivalry   Strong Love Interests   System Administrator   Transmigration   Vampires   Wealthy Characters   World Hopping   World Travel   Zombies
author: Sushou Zhezhi   素手折枝
description:
Qinghe County master Gu Sheng died. She had a first class beauty, her name could move the world, but she still lost to the hands of a woman inferior to her. Gu Sheng was only able to understand that she was the antagonist of the heroine after her death- a cannon fodder.

In a pure white space, Gu Sheng was expressionless after her death.

System: “The heroine must change her fate, must fight against cannon fodder and the passerby to brush a sense of existence. As the master, you are their biggest stone in the way.”

Gu Sheng’s eyes flashed and made a peerless smile, “Then let me see who is the stumbling block that should be trampled and who is the final winner!”>
